issue.summary: is AL603926.6 redundant?
issue.description: Unplaced contig NT_167217.1 may be redundant to reference chromosome 12
issue.resolution_text: Unplaced contig GL000223.1/NT_167217.1, which is based on a single finished BAC AL603926.6, has been found to be redundant to AC127070.10 (RP11-46H11) and AC073911.38 (RP11-386I8) on Chr 12. It has been removed from the assembly.

issue.summary: is CU459201.2 redundant?
issue.description: Unplaced contig NT_167236.1(CU459201.2) may be redundant with sequence on chr. 22/
issue.resolution_text: Unplaced contig NT_167236.1, which is based on a single finished cosmid CU459201.2 (SC22CB-37F8), is made redundant at the sequence level under the finished BAC AL022323.7 (CTA-243E7) on Chr 22. It has been removed from the assembly.

issue.summary: Confirm scaffold5537_294215_311518.1:1-10457 is a correctly assembled human sequence.
issue.description: Confirm that scaffold5537_294215_311518.1:1-10457, a YH1 scaffold described in PMID: 19997067 that does not align to GRCh37.p2 or sequences in NR, is a correctly assembled human sequence.
issue.resolution_text: scaffold5537_294215_311518.1:1-10457 has been confirmed as human sequence by alignment to AEKP01188814.1, a human WGS piece assembled from illumina sequence. Localization of scaffold5537_294215_311518.1:1-10457 will be worked on in HG-1594

issue.summary: Assignment of AL592183 from PMID: 18477386 to chr. Un for GRCh37
issue.status_text: Awaiting results of admixture mapping for AL592183.10
issue.description: AL592183 has been placed on Chr. Un b/c it has not been unambiguously localized to a specific chromosome.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Assignment of AL592188 from PMID: 18477386 to chr. Un for GRCh37
issue.status_text: Awaiting results of admixture mapping for AL592188.60
issue.description: AL592188, which contains a complete copy of the 45S rDNA cluster, has been placed on Chr. Un b/c it has not been unambiguously localized to a specific chromosome.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: AL590990 has been placed on Chr. Un b/c it has not been unambiguously localized to a specific chromosome.
issue.resolution_text: AL590990.36 has been cancelled and removed from the TPF so issue now resolved.

issue.summary: Assignment of BX294002 from PMID: 18477386 to chr. Un for GRCh37
issue.status_text: Clone BX294002.19 RP3-376K6 is a single block of ALR/Alpha satellite repeat, and with current methods is unable to be localized.
issue.description: BX294002 has been placed on Chr. Un b/c it has not been unambiguously localized to a specific chromosome.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Assignment of AL929347 from PMID: 18477386 to chr. Un for GRCh37
issue.description: AL929347 has been placed on Chr. Un b/c it has not been unambiguously localized to a specific chromosome.
issue.resolution_text: AL929347.8 is redundant, completely overlapped by RP1-24O22. It has been removed from the TPF.

issue.summary: Assignment of CT998553 from PMID: 18477386 to chr. Un for GRCh37
issue.description: CT998553 has been placed on Chr. Un b/c it has not been unambiguously localized to a specific chromosome.
issue.resolution_text: CT998553.2 is completely covered by AC005301 and AP000365 and is therefore redundant. It has been removed from the TPF.

issue.summary: Assignment of CU459125 from PMID: 18477386 to chr. Un for GRCh37
issue.description: CU459125 has been placed on Chr. Un b/c it has not been unambiguously localized to a specific chromosome.
issue.resolution_text: CU459125 has been removed from the Chr Un TPF as it is redundant.

issue.summary: Assignment of CU442762 from PMID: 18477386 to chr. Un for GRCh37
issue.description: CU442762 has been placed on Chr. Un b/c it has not been unambiguously localized to a specific chromosome.
issue.resolution_text: CU442762 is completely covered by BX004987 and is therefore redundant and has been removed from the TPF.

issue.summary: Assignment of CU459200 from PMID: 18477386 to chr. Un for GRCh37
issue.description: CU459200 has been placed on Chr. Un b/c it has not been unambiguously localized to a specific chromosome.
issue.resolution_text: CU459200 (SC22cB-33E8) is completely covered by chr.22 clones Z75744, Z81309 and Z69714 and is therefore redundant.

issue.summary: Assignment of CU459188 from PMID: 18477386 to chr. Un for GRCh37
issue.description: CU459188 has been placed on Chr. Un b/c it has not been unambiguously localized to a specific chromosome.
issue.resolution_text: CU459188 is redundant and has been removed from the TPF, therefore issue is resolved.

issue.summary: AC116622.6 has been added to ChrUn for GRCh38
issue.status_text: Unable to localize AC116622.6 further using current methods
issue.description: AC116622.6 has been added to ChrUn for GRCh38 (NT_187505.1). This is thought to represent a copy of an inter-chromosomal segmental duplication originating from chr. 4. See HG-1602 and PMID 21030649 (Supp. Fig. S24) for more info. A portion of this sequence was also a part of the 1000G phase 1 decoy for GRCh37.
issue.resolution_text: na
